eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
E_{_{B}} &=&\left( \frac{\omega }{2}+\frac{1}{\omega }\right) Q+4\pi \int
\left( \frac{1}{2}\left( f^{\prime}\right) ^{2}+f^{2}\left( 1-f^{2}\right)
^{2}\right) r^{2}dr  \nonumber \\
&=&\left( \frac{\omega }{2}+\frac{1}{\omega }\right) Q+4\pi \int \left(
\frac{f^{\prime }}{\sqrt{2}}+f\left( 1-f^{2}\right) \right)
^{2}r^{2}\,dr-4\pi \int \sqrt{2}f^{\prime }f\left( 1-f^{2}\right) r^{2}\,dr
\nonumber \\
&\geq &\left( \frac{\omega }{2}+\frac{1}{\omega }\right) Q-4\pi
\int \sqrt{2}f^{\prime }f\left( 1-f^{2}\right) r^{2}\,dr.
\label{EBog}
\
